H0.text: Who won the Ladies singles title at Wimbledon in 2004. Serena Williams

H1.text: Who won the Ladies singles title at Wimbledon in 2004. Justine Henin-Hardenne

H2.text: Who won the Ladies singles title at Wimbledon in 2004. Venus Williams

H3.text: Who won the Ladies singles title at Wimbledon in 2004. Sharapova

A4.text: Maria Sharapova defeated Serena Williams in the Women's singles final at the 2004 Wimbledon Championships.

A5.text: Serena Williams was unsuccessful in her title defense, being upset in the final by Maria Sharapova.
